title: La Bicicleta
subtitle: The Bicycle
meta_desc: Learn about bicycles in Spanish (bicicleta, pedales, casco, pasear) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish transportation, la bicicleta Spanish, bicycle in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
